meanings.sent1: Pointing towards the exit ignifies the way out.
meanings.sent3: The wagging tail of the dog ignifies his excitement.
meanings.sent4: The setting sun ignifies the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The ringing bell ignifies the start of class.

meanings.definition: To convey a particular meaning or message
meanings.sent1: Using hand gestures ignifies different emotions.
meanings.sent2: Her tone of voice ignifies her mood.
meanings.sent3: The colorful painting ignifies joy and creativity.
meanings.sent4: The silence in the room ignifies tension between them.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh bread ignifies comfort and warmth.
